errors.error_description: The git branch name is incorrect - using 'master' instead of 'main' which is the current default branch
Missing critical information about system requirements or dependencies needed before installation
correction_candidates: Before installation, ensure you have conda or miniconda installed on your system. Visit https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda/en/latest/user-guide/install/index.html for installation instructions.
Prerequisites: Python 3.8+ and git must be installed on your system before proceeding with the installation steps.
Note: This installation requires an active internet connection and approximately 500MB of disk space.
System Requirements: Linux, macOS, or Windows with WSL2. CUDA support is optional but recommended for GPU acceleration.
errors.golden_answer: Before installation, ensure you have conda or miniconda installed on your system. Visit https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda/en/latest/user-guide/install/index.html for installation instructions.
